titles.title: For the relief of Sara Lou Hendricks.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay the proceeds of a specified postal savings account and interest to a named individual in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States relating to such account.
